typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		{N° Reseau} as string,
		{Libelle Reseau Produit} as string,
		{N° Produit} as string,
		{Libelle long Produit} as string,
		{DDV Produit} as string,
		{DEV Produit} as string,
		{Supprimé ?} as string,
		{Date Suppression} as string,
		{Libellé du Type de support} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceproducts
source(output(
		ID as string,
		{N° Reseau} as string,
		{Libelle Reseau Produit} as string,
		{N° Produit} as string,
		{Libelle long Produit} as string,
		{DDV Produit} as string,
		{DEV Produit} as string,
		{Supprimé ?} as string,
		{Date Suppression} as string,
		{Libellé du Type de support} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
sourceproducts derive(DDV_Product = toDate(substring({DDV Produit},6,4)+"-"+substring({DDV Produit},3,2)+"-"+"0"+substring({DDV Produit},1,1)),
		DEV_Product = iif(length({DEV Produit})==10,toDate(substring({DEV Produit},7,4)+"-"+substring({DEV Produit},4,2)+"-"+substring({DEV Produit},1,2)),toDate(substring({DEV Produit},6,4)+"-"+substring({DEV Produit},3,2)+"-"+"0"+substring({DEV Produit},1,1)))) ~> DerivedColumnTypeConvertions
source1 derive() ~> DerivedColumn2
